definition: to twist (strands into a thread)/to entangle/to wring/to hang (by the neck)/to turn/to wind/classifier for skeins of yarn
thread/string/wire/line/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3],根[gen1]/(after a number) tier (unofficial ranking of a Chinese city)

sentences.english: In addition, the definition for twisted-pair is different in different network standard.
sentences.chinese: 另外，不同网络标准中对双绞线线脚定义也是不同的。

sentences.english: The twisted pair line also extremely has between each kind of equipment connection is fastidious.
sentences.chinese: 双绞线在各种设备之间的接法也非常有讲究。

sentences.english: Crossover functions may be implemented internally to a MAU or elsewhere in the twisted-pair link.
sentences.chinese: 交叉功能大多在MAU内或双绞线链路中其他处实现。

sentences.english: The network media is shielded twisted-pair censtomair conditionershled.
sentences.chinese: 网络介质利用屏蔽双绞线。

sentences.english: The network media is shielded twisted-pair cable.
sentences.chinese: 网络介质使用屏蔽双绞线。

sentences.english: Twisted-pair cables are most popular transmission medium in network engineering.
sentences.chinese: 双绞线是综合布线工程中最常用的传输介质。

sentences.english: Her beautiful twisted wire and bead designs will have you dashing to your bead box.
sentences.chinese: 她美丽的双绞线和珠设计，将你冲你的珠框。

sentences.english: Fiber-optic cable is rapidly replacing twisted-pair telephone lines.
sentences.chinese: 光缆正迅速地取代双绞线的电话线。

sentences.english: It is designed to provide unipolar differential drive to twisted pair or parallel wire transmission lines.
sentences.chinese: 它旨在为双绞线或并行线传输线路提供单极差分驱动。

sentences.english: Sharpest and clearest VGA quality over CAT5 of any manufacturer.
sentences.chinese: 最大和最明确的VGA质量超过任何制造商双绞线。

sentences.english: Shielded twisted pair is often used on networks using Token Ring topology.
sentences.chinese: 屏蔽双绞线通常被用来对网络使用令牌环拓扑。
